categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: Magernon's Amnesty was an event that occurred when former Imperial sergeant Magernon freed many prisoners from Substation Grimdock, including Imperial supporters and terrorists. The freed prisoners contacted their pirate associates to collect them from the prison, but the New Republic Defense Fleet blockaded them in, leading to a standoff. One of the prisoners freed from Substation Grimdock was the Pau'an gangster Fyzen Gor, who escaped in search of the Phylanx Redux Transmitter.
